USA: Juan de Fuca claimed to have found what was later named the Strait of Juan de Fuca.
Taiwan: Japan unsuccessfully seeks sovereignty over Taiwan (Takayamakoku 高山国 in Japanese, lit. high mountain country).
Sweden: Poland and Sweden enter into a short-lived personal union following the crowning of Sigismund III Vasa as King of Sweden.
Philippine: Miguel de Benavides's Doctrina Christiana in Chinese published
Japan: Toyotomi Hideyoshi, acting as kampaku (regent) in lieu of Oda Nobukatsu, invaded Korea.
Haiti: Queen Anacaona, leader of the last Taino kingdom in Haiti, is executed by Spanish governor.
China: Japanese invasions of Korea: Some two hundred thousand Japanese troops invaded Joseon.
